page.title: 09"MY DAY" BY BANKS'CHILDREN
page.content:
I WAKE UP AT 8 O CLOCK AND HAVE BREAK FAST.THEN I COME TO SCHOOL.WE HAVE MATHS.THEN WE HAVE P.E. I LIKE RELAY RACES BEST.THEN WE CARRY ON WITH OUR MATHS.WHEN IT IS 12 O CLOCK WE HAVE LUNCH.YOU CAN HAVE SCHOOL LUNCH OR BRING SANDWICHES.AFTER LUNCH WE PLAY, SOMETIMES ON THE HIGH JUMP OR SHORT TENNIS.WHEN WE COME IN WE HAVE READING AND SCIENCE.I USE THE COMPUTER IN MY CLASS.WE GO HOME AT 3.30.THEN I GO TO BROWNIES.
I LIKE SCHOOL.I ENJOY THE RECORDER GROUP AT LUNCHTIME.I AM LEARNING TO PLAY IT.MY FAVOURITE LESSONS ARE MATHS AND P.E. AND ART.MY DAY STARTS AT 7 O CLOCK WHEN I AM WOKEN UP BY MY MOTHER. I GET TO SCHOOL FOR 9 0 CLOCK.WE HAVE TWO PLAYTIMES AS WELL AS A MIDDAY BREAK.WE HAVE A STORY BEFORE HOMETIME. WHEN I GET HOME I PLAY WITH FRIENDS.
